channel.title: CVE Feed for Janobe -- School Attendance Monitoring System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Janobe -- School Attendance Monitoring System

item.title: CVE-2024-33968|2024-08-06T11:54:22.043Z -- janobe -- school%20attendance%20monitoring%20system
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in PayPal, Credit Card and Debit Card Payment affecting version 1.0. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted query to the server and retrieve all the information stored in it through the following 'Attendance' and 'YearLevel' in '/AttendanceMonitoring/report/index.php' parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-33972|2024-08-06T11:56:27.429Z -- janobe -- school%20attendance%20monitoring%20system
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in PayPal, Credit Card and Debit Card Payment affecting version 1.0. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted query to the server and retrieve all the information stored in it through the following 'events' in '/report/event_print.php' parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-33974|2024-08-06T11:57:17.030Z -- janobe -- school%20attendance%20monitoring%20system
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in PayPal, Credit Card and Debit Card Payment affecting version 1.0. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted query to the server and retrieve all the information stored in it through the following 'Users in '/report/printlogs.php' parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-33969|2024-08-06T11:55:02.847Z -- janobe -- school%20attendance%20monitoring%20system
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in PayPal, Credit Card and Debit Card Payment affecting version 1.0. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted query to the server and retrieve all the information stored in it through the following 'id' in '/AttendanceMonitoring/department/index.php' parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-33973|2024-08-06T11:56:55.835Z -- janobe -- school%20attendance%20monitoring%20system
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in PayPal, Credit Card and Debit Card Payment affecting version 1.0. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted query to the server and retrieve all the information stored in it through the following 'Attendance' and 'YearLevel' in '/report/attendance_print.php' parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-33970|2024-08-06T11:55:29.937Z -- janobe -- school%20attendance%20monitoring%20system
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in PayPal, Credit Card and Debit Card Payment affecting version 1.0. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted query to the server and retrieve all the information stored in it through the following 'studid' in '/candidate/controller.php' parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-33971|2024-08-06T11:55:59.506Z -- janobe -- school%20attendance%20monitoring%20system
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in PayPal, Credit Card and Debit Card Payment affecting version 1.0. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted query to the server and retrieve all the information stored in it through the following 'username' in '/login.php' parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-33967|2024-08-06T11:53:34.083Z -- janobe -- school%20attendance%20monitoring%20system
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in PayPal, Credit Card and Debit Card Payment affecting version 1.0. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted query to the server and retrieve all the information stored in it through the following 'view' in 'Attendance' and 'YearLevel' in '/AttendanceMonitoring/report/attendance_print.php' parameter.
